decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6148d978-7fff-7fb8-5b47-3c8bb6f418b1"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed elongated first-floor front window, by virtue of its size, proportions, and design, would fail to respond to local character and context and would fail to respect and complement the host property and the street's historic character, therefore having a harmful impact on the appearance of the host building and the visual amenities of the wider street scene.&nbsp;It would, therefore, be contrary to policies,&nbsp; LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020), policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and D4 (Delivering good design) of the London Plan (2021), and Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></p>

<p>The proposed boundary treatment, by reason of its increased height, design, and appearance, would be out of keeping with the pattern of development in the street and would be harmful to the host property, the terrace it forms part of. and wider street scene.&nbsp;<span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">As such, the proposal is contrary to policies </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">of the Hackney Local Plan LP33 (2020), policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">D4 (Delivering good design) of The London Plan (2021), and Hackney's </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009). </span><br></p>
description: Increasing height of front boundary wall and new front gate; replacement of first floor front windows with new metal windows, replacement of ground floor window and door with new metal window and timber door,  new rear windows; installation of new rooflights to front and rear roof slope
